tasks.dev: echo '[WEB] Starting web app in dev mode...' && sleep 0.5 && echo '[WEB] Web app running on port 4000'
tasks.test: echo '[WEB] Running web tests...' && sleep 0.3 && echo '[WEB] All web tests passed'
tasks.build: echo '[WEB] Building web app...' && sleep 0.6 && echo '[WEB] Web app build complete'
